hello! i have some questions: it is possible now to buy 8GB big USB sticks ... can i plug this into a PC(without HD) and install ubuntu from CD on the USB stick?
it's possible, yes.  But depending on your motherboard's BIOS you may or may not be able to boot from the USB drive.
generally speaking, if the motherboard was made in the last year or 2 you should be able to.
